details.point: Contribute to team's Particle Filter, Holonomic Time Optimized Autonomous Path Planner, and Yearly Robot Control Software.
Enhance robot capabilities, navigation, and autonomous capabilities by utilizing computer vision and environmental sensors (color, beam break, optical, etc.)
Direct development and maintainance of scouting application to efficiently collect and insightfully visualize high volumes of competition data.
Contribute to universally used FRC tools: TheBlueAlliance, a global competition data aggregation and insight platform, and WPILIB, the comprehensive Java framework for robot development and control.
Lead subteams in design, manufacturing, and programming of team robot and train new members to contribute to robot development. Attend 20+ STEM community outreach events.
4th ranked team in California, 12th out of 9000+ total teams; World Championship Division and Double California Regional Event Winning Team in 2024.
Highly selective 4 week UCLA Neurology and AI Summer Program (<4.6% acceptance rate.)
Rapidly developed comprehensive understanding of transformers, recurrent networks, advanced regression, reinforcement learning, convolutional models, advanced training optimization.
Started program as HS rising junior without any prior knowledge, created/optimized numerous architectures for given use cases.
Cofounded non-profit organization to host accessible and engaging free STEM camps for local elementary, middle, and high school students.

Developed engaging curriculums, recruited mentors, managed logistical aspects, and effectively taught several in-person and online camps covering diverse STEM fields including Lego Robotics, Engineering Principles, 3D Modeling, Web Development, and Machine Learning.

Impacted 500+ students, raised $4800+ to support organization costs, local robotics team STEM outreach initiatives, and cardiac care foundation for vulnerable infants in underserved indian communities.
